summary: VBT Camera Phase 3 Testing Complete - All backend tests pass (8/8). Frontend graphs verified: Velocity Loss by Set chart displays correctly in Scientific Analysis tab with camera data integration.

issues: Load-Velocity Profile shows 'Insufficient data' when all sets use same load (80kg) - this is expected behavior since linear regression requires different load values

critical_code_review_comments: VBT data with provider='camera' is saved correctly with all required fields
velocity_loss_analysis calculation is correct: compares each set's mean_velocity to first set baseline
Query cache invalidation in vbt-camera.tsx properly invalidates vbt-analysis, scientific-analysis, and strength-analysis queries
ScientificAnalysisTab.tsx correctly renders VelocityLossChart with data from vbt_analysis.velocity_loss_analysis
Load-Velocity Profile shows 'Insufficient data' because all camera test sets use same load - need varied loads for regression
seed_data_creation: VBT data with provider='camera' created via test execution for Back Squat, Deadlift, and Bench Press exercises
context_for_next_testing_agent: VBT Camera Phase 3 integration verified. Backend endpoints correctly store and return camera VBT data. Frontend Scientific Analysis tab displays 'Velocity Loss by Set' chart with bars showing velocity loss percentages per set. Load-Velocity Profile chart shows 'Insufficient data' when all sets use same load - this is expected behavior. To see the full Load-Velocity Profile chart, need VBT data with varied loads (e.g., 60kg, 80kg, 100kg).
features_verified: POST /api/vbt/data saves camera provider data correctly - VERIFIED
GET /api/vbt/athlete/{id} returns camera VBT data - VERIFIED
GET /api/vbt/analysis/{id} returns velocity_loss_analysis with set/velocity/loss_percent - VERIFIED
GET /api/analysis/scientific/{id} includes VBT analysis from camera data - VERIFIED
Scientific Analysis tab shows VBT section with Velocity Loss by Set chart - VERIFIED
Query cache invalidation works correctly after saving camera data - VERIFIED
Velocity loss percentages calculated correctly from first set baseline - VERIFIED

mocked_api.note: Bar tracking in vbt-camera.tsx uses simulation mode (useSimulation: true) for web preview - real MediaPipe tracking requires native build
